forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East southeast wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1am, then a slight chance of snow showers between 1am and 2am. Cloudy, with a low around 33. West wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
